"Guiden": "As you can see, Item Labs let you exchange spare Special Ability Capusles for higher grade versions."
"If you ever have too many capsules lying around, you should try exchanging them for ones you can make use of."
"Now, next up... Use that Item Lab to install some capsules."
"Again, you decide which capsules you want to exchange, and which piece of gear you want to use them on."
